basics.name: Jameyia Shamia
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying Computer Engineering at the University Hawai'i of Manoa. I plan to start my own companies showcasing new electronic products.

work.summary: Professional driver of multiple vehicles for the company
highlights: Transport high profile clientele and celebrities safely and efficiently to various destinations
Trained to operate luxury SUVs, Mercedes Sprinter vans, and stretch limousines

work.summary: Taught myself how to build a website using a book from the library and the internet
highlights: Worked with business owner to come up with the design, layout, and functionality of the website
Obtained skills necessary to complete the customer's demands through self research

work.summary: Mentored students through in person meetings, email, and panel discussions about transferring to UH Manoa from Kaua'i Comunity College (KCC)
highlights: One of six KCC alumni chosen to form a panel for prospective KCC transfer students
Answer questions about application process, student life, and career opportunities to prospective students

awards.title: Eta Kappa Nu (HKN) Delta Omega Chapter Membership
awards.summary: Met academic qualifications and succeed in completing one year of volunteer and charitable work to earn membership

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Met academic qualifications to be awarded the Dean's List multiple times as an undergraduate

awards.title: AFCEA Hawai'i Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded AFCEA Hawai'i scholarship due to my academic and professional success

awards.title: Phi Theta Kappa Membership
awards.summary: Awarded Phi Theta Kappa membership due to my academic status

awards.summary: Awarded Dean's List due to my academic status
